thread.title: Couple get amorous while waiting for late-night pizza in North Yorkshire | Metro News
thread.title_full: Couple get amorous while waiting for late-night pizza in North Yorkshire | Metro News

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Couple get amorous while waiting for late-night pizza in North Yorkshire | Metro News
text:
Richard Hartley-Parkinson for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 2:33 pm 
A CCTV tape has emerged showing a football fan enjoying an amorous hook-up with a female – while waiting for a pizza. 
The footage shows a Leeds United supporter shielding himself from the camera in takeaway as a woman appears slumped on her knees in front of him. 
The 30 second clip then flicks to the man gyrating himself on the female as they both wait for their food in Scarborough, North Yorkshire. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
The man, who was donning Leeds’ home football jersey, hid behind the counter with his female companion and held onto the takeaway bar for stability. 
Footage surfaced on Twitter after it was captured on Saturday night following Leeds United’s 1-0 win over Yorkshire rivals Sheffield Wednesday. 
Asked about the incident, a spokesperson for Dominos said: ‘We can’t comment on something like that – it’s a no comment from us.’ More
